name: Yogi Bear in Yogi Bear's Goldrush
overview: Here comes Yogi! America's favorite cartoon bear is coming to the Game Boy. Jellystone Park is in trouble. The evil Jake has stolen all of the Park's money. Yogi must make his way through the different areas of the park, find the 12 secret safes and defeat Jake or else the Park will be shut down. - Six extensive sections of Jellystone Park to explore, each with many hidden areas and secrets. - Sections of the park include an enchanted forest, an underground cave, pirate boat, city streets, and old western town. - Out maneuver the denizens of the park in fast paced action, solve tricky puzzles within the levels, and defeat challenging bosses.
